sub_title: Brand Manager | NOV (RT) Marine and Construction
summary:
Data-driven project management professional with a demonstrated history of working in the consulting and research industries. 

Passionate about big data, international relations, customer insights and determined to reach and exceed targets. 

A highly energetic self-starter who is eager to learn and develop personally and professionally.

certifications.name: Marketing on LinkedIn: The Sophisticated Marketer's Guide
Learning Google Data Studio for Marketers

projects.title: Influencer Marketing Campaign 2021
projects.description:
Execute the campaign in close collaboration with an agency to build awareness of the Thai Select’s Certificate awarded by the Royal Thai Governments. 

Aim to target the Benelux market by selecting an influencer of a lifestyle category, Channah Koerten to represent this campaign.

Impact: (2 Integrated contents : 4 Paid posts | 3 Earned posts)
- Achieved impressions at 143.09% over-performed of KPI setting.
- Earned 2.5% ER (Engagement Rate), and 0.76% CTR (Click-through-rate)

contributors.headline: Brand Manager | NOV (RT) Marine and Construction

projects.title: Influencer Marketing Campaign 2020
projects.description:
Initiate an influencer marketing campaign in close collaboration with an agency to promote Thai foods, products, and restaurants. 

Aim to target the Dutch market by selecting a Dutch influencer of a healthy category, Carolina van Dorenmalen to represent this campaign.

To build awareness of the Thai Select’s Certificate awarded by the Royal Thai Governments to the Benelux market.

Impact: (2 Integrated contents: 4 Paid posts | 2 Earned posts)
- Achieved impressions at 244% over-performed of KPI setting.
- Earned 3.1% ER (Engagement Rate), and 0.4% CTR (Click-through-rate)
- The brand-related sentiment is very positive. The audience reacted very well to the collaboration, and to the authentic way — the content was incorporated into her videos. 
- The audience joined the conversation regarding their favorite Thai dishes and asked in-depth questions about ingredients.

projects.title: Echelon — Thailand 2017
projects.description:
Business Development & Event Coordinator together with Belgian team — Participated 3 days event of the ECHELON Thailand 2017, also known as e27, which is organized annually.

- Networking 
- Pitching
- Setting up boots and representing the company under South East Asia Team
- Business Develop: approach investors, agency and clients.
- Achieved more than 100 targeting

e27 had presented a phenomenal and exciting platform where different cultures with a variety of approaches to Technology, Business, Investment, Funding, Innovation, and Entrepreneurship.

contributors.headline: Brand Manager | NOV (RT) Marine and Construction

projects.title: Tech in Asia — Singapore 2016
projects.description:
Event Coordinator — Participated TechInAsia 2016 in Singapore. Networking and introducing Godzilist Asia into the Tech business. 

It was an amazing conference with many new start-ups pitching for their business ideas.

Investors, incubators, founders and guests were mingling at the stands, in speed dating sessions and of course at pitching sessions in front of an audience with panels to evaluate.

contributors.headline: Brand Manager | NOV (RT) Marine and Construction

projects.title: Finding Insights - Product Concept Evaluation
projects.description:
Our client is one of the leading food and beverage companies in Thailand.

Research Objectives:
- To study concept image, potential, and preference.
- To study consumers’ needs and potential products that align with a functional drink brand.

Methodology: 
- Focus Group Discussion (Qualitative research) 
- N = 4 groups | 6 respondents per group

Learning :
- Able to evaluate the acceptance level of consumers on the new product concepts. 
- Gained a depth understanding of consumers' lifestyle, health-conscious, and behavior regarding healthiness for new product development purposes.
- Received good feedback from the client’s marketing team.
- Earned customer satisfaction that led to brand loyalty and built a good relationship with external stakeholders.

contributors.headline: Brand Manager | NOV (RT) Marine and Construction

projects.title: Market Research - Evaluate packaging design
projects.description:
To evaluate packaging designs of a major client in the leading glassware company in the industry to find a winning design.

Key elements:
    A:    Attraction / Uniqueness
    B:    Brand image – (i.e. modern, user-friendly, high quality)
    C:    Communication of glass function

Note: 
This campaign was the very first project of my career that I had involved in all processes including drafting a proposal, designing a questionnaire, identifying key target segments using quantitative research, analyses, writing reports, and providing added value recommendations. 

Results:
- Our team received positive feedback from the client. I have presented the research findings to the client’s product development teams to design their consumer journey, improve the product, and marketing campaigns. 
- Gain feedback from target consumers for further design improvement i.e. positive elements/style that attract most of the target consumers, elements that should be removed/avoid in the design, etc.

contributors.headline: Brand Manager | NOV (RT) Marine and Construction

projects.title: Give Love to Get Love
projects.description:
The Father Ray Foundation takes care of 850 orphaned, abused and disadvantaged children and students with disabilities. 

I have had a chance to be a president of the Ethics seminar's project named Give Love to Get Love. The project founded by the service learning department of Assumption University to cooperate with a non-profit organisation, Father Ray Foundation.

With the intention to re-evaluate how we give and inspire more joy and human connection. We felt there was a need for a physical presence to symbolize this movement, so we created a giving chain that we hope to inspire a chain reaction of love for those children.

authors.headline: Brand Manager | NOV (RT) Marine and Construction

profile_positions.description:
• Act as a lead officer and Project manager in marketing activities in the Benelux market. Develop plans for trade promotion activities such as online marketing campaigns, In-store promotions, events.
• Conduct a market survey/research, analyze data, monitor Benelux trade, and economic situations, governments’ policies, market trends, and trade regulations that would affect Thailand’s export.
• Liaise with the local government agencies, trade associations and organizations.
• Provide information for Thai, Dutch, and Benelux entrepreneurs in relation to trade and investment.
• Coordinate and organize trade promotion events e.g, business matching activities, in-store promotion with importers, local supermarket or department store, etc.
• Coordinate and facilitate Thailand’s participation in local trade fairs and arrangements of trade missions or official visits both from Thailand and to Thailand.
• Coordinate appointments for Thai exporters, Dutch and Benelux importers, and government agencies.
• Coordinate appointments with current and potential importers and construct Importer’s visit report.
• Develop action plan for trade promotion activities.
• Conduct interpretation or translation on occasional assignment.
• Participate in any activities of Team Thailand.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Project Manager (Benelux)

profile_positions.description:
(Freelance Contract)
•  Responsible for all data preparation, quality control, data cleaning, and analysis including tabulation, as well as reporting of various quantitative research projects.
•  Apply data processing and technical skills to extract and analyse data to be useful information sets to support management decisions in close coordination with project managers.
•  Develop Excel based on client deliverables/ reports and support PowerPoint report production as required.
• Responsible for verbatim coding across all local research projects.
• Interpreting data, analysing results using statistical techniques.
• Developing and implementing data analyses, data collection systems and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality.
• Building models to challenge the status quo and improvement opportunities.
• Presenting information using data visualization techniques.
• Managing and ensuring projects get completed on time and budget.
• Monitor and coordinate closely with both external and internal stakeholders to clarify and meet requirements and project schedule.
• Any other ad-hoc duties assigned.
profile_positions.title: Assistant to Global Project Manager - Freelance

profile_positions.description:
•  In charge of SEA market (South East Asia) included HR management, Marketing and Business Development.
•  PMO - Budget management and Account management
•   Assist in content marketing initiatives to drive traffic, engagement, leads, that deliver sales and customer retention.
•   Evaluate opportunities for partnerships, sponsorships and advertising on an on-going basis.
•   Contacting potential clients via email or phone to establish rapport and set up meetings,  pitching products and/or services, maintaining fruitful relationships with existing customers,  preparing PowerPoint presentations, developing quotes and proposals, negotiating and renegotiating by phone, email, and in person.
•   Planning and overseeing new marketing initiatives and attending conferences, meetings, and industry events.
•   Assist in the development of editorial governance so content is consistent with brand voice, style and tone.
•   Build relationships with thought leaders to grow industry awareness.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Executive

profile_positions.description:
•   Working since the Early Stage Startup in South East Asia; Thailand, Vietnam and Indonesia.
•   Developing new Infotainment platform of snackable content based on top 5 of anything.
•   Managing digital campaigns and day-to-day web activities including social advertising campaigns, community-outreach efforts, content development and social networking sites
•   Conducting research, writing and presenting text in ways that appeal target audience
•   Social Media Management Implementing SEO Strategy.
•   Utilising Facebook’s Business Manager and Ads Manager.
•   Analysing Google Analytic, Facebook analytic and make a report.
•   Training personnel and helping team members develop their skills.
profile_positions.title: Community / Content Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Involving the whole research project including draft proposal, design questionnaire, analyses, writing reports and provide added value recommendations. 
• Identify key target segments using both qualitative and quantitative research.
• Conduct empathy research to understand the problems and needs of our target users.
• Designing surveys and questionnaires to test your research hypothesis with real app users.
• Present research findings to product development teams in order to design consumer journey and app features.
• Analysing result after each new launch to see whether the hypothesis and finding are right.
• Share consumer research with branding and communication teams to design the right campaign.
• Any other ad-hoc duties assigned.
profile_positions.title: Project Management Association

volunteer_experiences.description: Selected to be one of hundred volunteers from more than 4,000 candidates | Provide VVIP guests’ care and comfort such as Kate Robertson: founder, Kofi Annan and the Governor of Bangkok.

volunteer_experiences.role: President of Give Love to Get Love Project
volunteer_experiences.description:
The Father Ray Foundation takes care of 850 orphaned, abused and disadvantaged children and students with disabilities. 

I have a chance to work on the Ethics seminar's project of Give Love to Get Love. The project was founded by the service learning department of Assumption University to cooperate together with a non-profit organisation, "Father Ray Foundation." With the intention to re-evaluate how we give and inspire more joy and human connection. We felt there was a need for a physical presence to symbolize this movement, so we created a giving chain that we hope to inspire a chain reaction of love for those children.
